尋找朋友.name: Find a Friend
尋找朋友.description: Put 1 random Grass Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

芳香催眠.name: Soothing Scent
芳香催眠.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

毒粉.name: Poison Powder
毒粉.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

熱帶揮擊.name: Tropical Swing
熱帶揮擊.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

雙重角擊.name: Double Horn
雙重角擊.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

綠葉供給.name: Leaf Supply
綠葉供給.description: Take a Grass Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Grass Pokémon.

偷襲.name: Surprise Attack
偷襲.description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

火花.name: Ember
火花.description: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

火焰漩渦.name: Fire Spin
火焰漩渦.description: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

紅蓮風暴.name: Crimson Storm
紅蓮風暴.description: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

搖尾巴.name: Tail Whip
搖尾巴.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

噴射火焰.name: Flamethrower
噴射火焰.description: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

熱力衝撞.name: Heat Tackle
熱力衝撞.description: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

猛火衝刺.name: Inferno Onrush
猛火衝刺.description: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

神鳥猛擊.name: Sky Attack
神鳥猛擊.description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

烈火之舞.name: Inferno Dance
烈火之舞.description: Flip 3 coins. ake an amount of Fire Energy from your Energy Zone equal to the number of heads and attach it to your Benched  Fire Pokémon in any way you like.

大字爆炎.name: Fire Blast
大字爆炎.description: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

水砲.name: Hydro Pump
水砲.description: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Water Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

水箭炮.name: Hydro Bazooka
水箭炮.description: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Water Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

頭痛.name: Headache
頭痛.description: Your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand during their next turn.

毒之觸手.name: Poison Tentacles
毒之觸手.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

必殺蟹鉗.name: KO Crab
必殺蟹鉗.description: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 80 more damage.

水箭.name: Water Arrow
水箭.description: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

角刺.name: Horn Hazard
角刺.description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

破壞死光.name: Hyper Beam
破壞死光.description: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

水炮.name: Hydro Pump
水炮.description: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Water Energy attached, this attack does 70 more damage.

古代潮旋.name: Ancient Whirlpool
古代潮旋.description: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't attack.

冰凍光束.name: Ice Beam
冰凍光束.description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

暴風雪.name: Blizzard
暴風雪.description: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

攻擊傷口.name: Second Strike
攻擊傷口.description: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

細雪.name: Powder Snow
細雪.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

十萬伏特.name: Thunderbolt
十萬伏特.description: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

電氣陣.name: Circle Circuit
電氣陣.description: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Lightning Pokémon.

電擊拳.name: Thunder Punch
電擊拳.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

飛彈針.name: Pin Missile
飛彈針.description: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

颶風雷電.name: Hurricane Thunder
颶風雷電.description: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

落雷.name: Thundering Hurricane
落雷.description: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

雷電箭.name: Thunder Spear
雷電箭.description: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

雷電牙.name: Thunder Fang
雷電牙.description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

電光一閃.name: Quick Attack
電光一閃.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

電擊.name: Thunder Shock
電擊.description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

瞬間移動.name: Teleport
瞬間移動.description: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

精神強念.name: Psychic
精神強念.description: his attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

屏障攻擊.name: Barrier Attack
屏障攻擊.description: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.

精神傳達.name: Psychic Exchange
精神傳達.description: Look at all of your opponent's face-down prize cards.

找麻煩.name: Bother
找麻煩.description: Your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand during their next turn.

力量爆破.name: Power Blast
力量爆破.description: Discard 2 Psychic Energy from this Pokémon.

精神衝鋒.name: Psydrive
精神衝鋒.description: Discard 2 Psychic Energy from this Pokémon.

雙重金勾臂.name: Double Lariat
雙重金勾臂.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

精神強念20.name: Psychic
精神強念20.description: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

挖洞.name: Dig
挖洞.description: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

還擊.name: Fight Back
還擊.description: If this Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

捨身衝撞.name: Double-Edge
捨身衝撞.description: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

叫聲.name: Growl
叫聲.description: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do -20 damage.

骨頭迴力鏢.name: Bonemerang
骨頭迴力鏢.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.

伸腿踢.name: Stretch Kick
伸腿踢.description: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

甲殼攻擊.name: Shell Attack
甲殼攻擊.description: This Pokémon does 50 damage to itself.

吸血.name: Leech Life
吸血.description: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

揍飛.name: Knock Back
揍飛.description: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

窮追不捨.name: Corner
窮追不捨.description: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

呼朋引伴.name: Call for Family
呼朋引伴.description: Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck onto your Bench.

甜蜜攻擊.name: Lovestrike
甜蜜攻擊.description: This attack does 50 more damage for each of your Benched Nidoking.

毒角.name: Poison Horn
毒角.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

毒瓦斯.name: Poison Gas
毒瓦斯.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

毒液衝擊.name: Venoshock
毒液衝擊.description: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 50 more damage.

咬碎.name: Crunch
咬碎.description: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

聚積.name: Amass
聚積.description: Take 1  Energy from your Metal Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

流星群.name: Draco Meteor
流星群.description: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.

直衝鑽.name: Drill Run
直衝鑽.description: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

催眠曲.name: Sleepy Song
催眠曲.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

暗影爪.name: Shadow Claw
暗影爪.description: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

連環舔舔.name: Continuous Lick
連環舔舔.description: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

迷魂拳.name: Dizzy Punch
迷魂拳.description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

任意複製.name: Copy Anything
任意複製.description: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack. If this Pokémon doesn't have the necessary Energy to use that attack, this attack does nothing.

原始振翼.name: Primal Wingbeat
原始振翼.description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent shuffles their Active Pokémon back into their deck.

友情之環.name: Do the Wave
友情之環.description: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

突擊.name: Assault
突擊.description: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

唱歌.name: Sing
唱歌.description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

微成長.name: 微成長
微成長.description: 從自己的能量區抽出1個草能量，付於這隻寶可夢身上。

強力綻放.name: 強力綻放
強力綻放.description: 以這隻寶可夢身上的能量的數量擲硬幣，造成正面出現的次數×50點傷害。

搖曳孢子.name: 搖曳孢子
搖曳孢子.description: 將對手的戰鬥寶可夢睡眠。

能量鞭打.name: 能量鞭打
能量鞭打.description: 若額外附有3個草能量，則增加70點傷害。

踩踏10.name: 踩踏
踩踏10.description: 擲1次硬幣若為正面，則增加30點傷害。

上衝.name: 上衝
上衝.description: 擲1次硬幣若為正面，則增加60點傷害。

大字爆炎2.name: 大字爆炎
大字爆炎2.description: 將這隻寶可夢身上的2個火能量丟棄。

火碎流.name: 火碎流
火碎流.description: 將這隻寶可夢身上的2個火能量丟棄，對手的1隻寶可夢受到80點傷害。

毒液衝擊40.name: 毒液衝擊
毒液衝擊40.description: 若對手的戰鬥寶可夢中毒，則增加40點傷害。

毒之爪.name: 毒之爪
毒之爪.description: 將對手的戰鬥寶可夢中毒。

躍起逃走.name: 躍起逃走
躍起逃走.description: 這隻寶可夢與備戰寶可夢互換。

暴亂潮旋.name: 暴亂潮旋
暴亂潮旋.description: 將雙方的所有寶可夢身上附加的隨機1個能量丟棄。

直衝水.name: 直衝水
直衝水.description: 對手的1隻備戰寶可夢受到50點傷害。

潛水.name: 潛水
潛水.description: 擲1次硬幣若為正面，則在下個對手的回合，這隻寶可夢不會受到招式的傷害與效果的影響。

電氣陣10.name: 電氣陣
電氣陣10.description: 造成自己的備戰區雷系寶可夢數量×10點傷害。

終極電光.name: 終極電光
終極電光.description: 對手的所有備戰寶可夢也受到20點傷害。

雷電箭40.name: 雷電箭
雷電箭40.description: 對手的1隻寶可夢受到40點傷害。

電網.name: 電網
電網.description: 在下個對手的回合，受到這個招式的寶可夢無法撤退。

基因駭入.name: 基因駭入
基因駭入.description: 選擇1個對手的戰鬥寶可夢持有的招式，作為這個招式使用。

扣殺抽出.name: 扣殺抽出
扣殺抽出.description: 從自己的牌庫抽出1張卡。

意志劫持.name: 意志劫持
意志劫持.description: 增加對手備戰寶可夢的數量×20點傷害。

目不轉睛.name: 目不轉睛
目不轉睛.description: 將對手的戰鬥寶可睡眠。

綻放閃耀.name: 綻放閃耀
綻放閃耀.description: 將自己的所有寶可夢恢復20HP。

真氣突刺.name: 真氣突刺
真氣突刺.description: 擲1次硬幣若為反面，則這個招式失敗。

防守壓制.name: 防守壓制
防守壓制.description: 在下個對手的回合，這隻寶可夢受到招式的傷害-30點。

報復.name: 報復
報復.description: 在上個對手的回合，若自己的寶可夢因招式的傷害而昏厥，則增加60點傷害。

分裂.name: 分裂
分裂.description: 從自己的牌庫隨機將1張「瓦斯彈」放置於備戰區。

煙幕.name: 煙幕
煙幕.description: 在下個對手的回合，當受到這個招式的寶可夢使用招式時，對手擲1次硬幣。若為反面，則該招式失敗。

毒針.name: 毒針
毒針.description: 將對手的戰鬥寶可夢中毒。

橫掃旋風.name: 橫掃旋風
橫掃旋風.description: 增加對手備戰寶可夢的數量×20點傷害。

鬥志衝撞.name: 鬥志衝撞
鬥志衝撞.description: 若對手的戰鬥寶可夢為「寶可夢ex」，則增加80點傷害。

連續舞步.name: 連續舞步
連續舞步.description: 擲硬幣直到出現反面，造成正面出現次數的×20點傷害。

模仿.name: 模仿
模仿.description: 將自己的手牌全部放回牌庫。從自己的牌庫抽出與對手的手牌張數相同數量的卡。
